mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (seq, title, writer, content, flag) VALUES((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from board), #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{flag})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, writer, regdate, cnt, flag FROM board ORDER BY seq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnaboard (seq, writerId, title, phone, email, qnaType, content, storeRegion, storeName, result) VALUES((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from qnaboard), #{writerId}, #{title}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{qnaType}, #{content}, #{storeRegion}, #{storeName}, '처리대기')
mapper.update: UPDATE qnaboard SET result=#{result} WHERE seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, seq, title, regdate, result FROM (SELECT * FROM qnaboard ORDER BY seq desc)) WHERE rnum>=? AND rnum<=?"
